name: QUEEN THARU-MD
description: A Whatsapp md bot built By Naveed to make experience better

ALIVE_MESSAGE.description: ඔබට දැමීමට අවශ්‍ය Alive මැසෙජ් එක මෙතනට යොදන්න

AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: ස්ටෙටස් විඩියෝ ඔටො බලන්න ඔනි නම් true දෙන්න

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: Put HEROKU APP NAME same as above./ මුලින්ම දැමු නම නිවැරදිව නැවතත් මෙතනට දමන්න(App name)

ANTI_BAD_WORD.description: Put words here. If you want it enabled in your bot otherwise leave it blank

FAKE_COUNTRY_CODE.description: Put the Fake Country Code number without +

LEVEL_UP_MESSAGE.description: Fill the value true if you want bot send Level up message in chat./ levelup මැසෙජ් එක ඔටො යැවීමට true/false

READ_MESSAGE.description: එයාලා මැසෙජ් එකක් දාපු ගමන් මැසෙජ් එක සීන් වෙන්න හදන්න true දෙන්න

PREFIX.description: Enter your desired prefix for bot.

OWNER_NUMBER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

SESSION_ID.description: Please put your Session ID that u scanned from the bot.... If u haven't scanned go to QUEEN THARU-MD Github Repo U can find the Scanner Option

OPENAI_API_KEY.description: Please put your OPENAI api key here.Get it from beta.openai.com(optional if u don't wan't then don't put it

MONGODB_URI.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required),change for better experience. you don't have Mongodb url then go to QUEEN THARU-MD github repo and get public url

THEME.description: Don't Change . No Need To Change Only Avilable King-Vajira-Md./ මෙය වෙනස් කරන්න එපා

WORKTYPE.description: Worktype of your bot. Use public or private, if it is private then only bot number can use it. If public then everyone can use it.

heroku.description: Weather it is on heroku or not
